title: Hong Fa Temple
description: Temple name is 罗湖区莲塘仙湖植物园弘法寺内, restaurant name 泓法寺素食, address 莲塘仙湖植物园里泓法寺. Offers a simple vegetarian set menu. It's part of a large Buddhist temple complex that's open to visitors and quite busy on weekends. Direction: mini-bus 468 (from the Hua Qiang Bei area) ends at the gates of Xian Hu (Fairy Lake) Park. From there, buy a ticket and walk inside the gates. Take the shuttle bus to the temple gate. Or by taxi (around 30-40 yuan from Luohu Station area, tell the driver "Xian Hu".
streetAddress: Xian Hu Park, Fairy Lake Botanical Garden, Luohu District
